news.headline: Baltic foreign ministers to discuss regional events at National Press Club on Feb. 6, including disconnecting from Russian grid.
news.summary: On February 6, 2025, the Foreign Ministers of Latvia, Lithuania, and Estonia are scheduled to address the media at a National Press Club Newsmaker event in Washington. The focus of the briefing will be on recent developments in the Baltic region, particularly the decision to disconnect from the Russian electricity grid. This move is part of ongoing efforts to enhance regional energy security and independence. Stay tuned for insights and updates on this significant geopolitical development.

news.headline: NYSE provides daily pre-market updates for market insights. Kristen Scholer delivers updates from NYSE Trading Floor.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) announced the introduction of a daily pre-market update provided from the NYSE Trading Floor. This service offers market insights before the commencement of trading activities. Kristen Scholer is responsible for delivering the pre-market update. Investors can access this information to stay informed about market conditions each day, enhancing their decision-making process. This initiative aims to provide essential updates for traders, creating a valuable resource for those engaging in the stock market.

news.headline: Global Healthcare Smart Contracts market valued at US$3.2 Billion in 2024, projected to reach US$10.1 Billion by 2030 with CAGR of 21.4%. Report covers 40+ players including Aetsoft, Microsoft, and IBM.
news.summary: A recent report on Healthcare Smart Contracts, available on ResearchAndMarkets.com, reveals that the global market was worth US$3.2 billion in 2024 and is anticipated to escalate to US$10.1 billion by 2030. This represents a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 21.4% during the period from 2024 to 2030. The report offers a detailed analysis of market trends and drivers, equipping businesses with valuable insights to guide strategic decision-making. The surge in the healthcare smart contracts sector is evident from these remarkable figures.

news.headline: Trade deficit surged before Trump took office, reaching $666 billion. Tariff pledges made.
Serac Healthcare gets FDA approval for Phase III trial design for endometriosis imaging agent. Positive feedback received.
news.summary: Serac Healthcare Limited, a clinical radiopharmaceutical company, received positive feedback on its Phase III trial design for an innovative molecular imaging agent. This announcement was made on February 5, 2025, in London. The company is moving forward with the development of the agent following the encouraging results. Stay tuned for further updates on this promising development.

news.headline: Scentbird and OkCupid join forces for Sexy Scent Study on how olfactory impacts dating life.
news.summary: In a recent study conducted in New York on February 5, 2025, the leading dating platform OkCupid collaborated with fragrance experts at Scentbird to explore the impact of scent on dating experiences. This unique study, titled the Sexy Scent Study, is being unveiled just before Valentine's Day. The collaboration aims to dissect how olfactory stimuli influence romantic encounters. Stay tuned for the groundbreaking findings from this pioneering research endeavor.

news.headline: RB Residential partners with Sky Quarry through LOI to merge sustainability tech with its expert roofing services in Texas.
news.summary: In Round Rock, Texas, on February 5, 2025, RB Residential, Inc. also known as Restoration Builders, a leading provider of roofing repair and restoration services, has revealed the agreement of a Letter of Intent (LOI) with Sky Quarry, Inc. The LOI signing marks a significant step in the collaboration between the two companies, with Sky Quarry, Inc. being listed on the NASDAQ.

news.headline: Injured in police shootout, founder launches protein-coffee blend; inspiring story unveiled. Story took place in Fort Lauderdale, Fla. on Feb. 5, 2025.
news.summary: Following a severe injury sustained during a police shootout, an innovative protein-coffee blend was launched in Fort Lauderdale, Florida, on February 5, 2025. The product was created as a result of this incident which serves as the impetus for the brand's inception. This unique blend is the brainchild of individuals who have chosen to remain unidentified. The brand's origin story is a vital component of its identity, setting it apart from other successful companies that have emerged from individual concepts or anonymous entrepreneurs.

news.headline: Novelis surplus assets to be auctioned by Holland Industrial Group & PPL Group in a two-day event.(Graphs and data not mentioned)
news.summary: A top aluminum producer has joined forces with Holland Industrial Group and PPL Group to provide high-quality equipment in a partnership. The announcement was made in Buckhannon, W.Va. and Clayton, N.J. on February 5, 2025. The collaboration will see a significant two-day auction showcasing premium equipment.

news.headline: SYNEVIT® has spent almost 30 years blending technology and nature in supplement manufacturing to create synergy.
news.summary: For almost three decades, SYNEVIT® has dedicated its efforts to fostering synergy across all aspects of the supplement manufacturing process. Based in FORT LAUDERDALE, Fla., as of Feb. 5, 2025, the company has strived to harness the power of synergy to drive innovation, enhance product quality, and optimize outcomes. This commitment to synergy has been instrumental in shaping the company's approach to health and wellness.

news.headline: Key Juice launches online store, offering signature keychain chargers for easy ordering.
news.summary: In Stone Mountain, Georgia, on February 5, 2025, Key Juice, a company specializing in portable power solutions at locations like LaGuardia Airport, has revealed its latest online platform for consumers. This launch allows customers to conveniently purchase their popular keychain chargers through the new website. As charging power banks continue to grow in demand, this move aims to enhance the accessibility for consumers.

news.headline: SYNCADOL® and SYNEVIT® are front-line defenses during cold and flu season, boosting immune system with potent Vitamin D3.
news.summary: A highly effective Vitamin D3 supplement by SYNEVIT® is tailored to enhance body resilience and fortify the immune system. Amidst the prevailing cold and flu season, the product aims to provide substantial support. Being optimized for maximum impact, it is designed to bolster health and immunity. As of Feb. 5, 2025, in FORT LAUDERDALE, this supplement is gaining traction to combat illnesses as the grim statistics indicate that numerous individuals have been battling sickness throughout the prolonged season.

news.headline: RSi wins 2025 KLAS Research "Best in KLAS" award for Debt Collection Services. Top marks nationwide.
news.summary: A company headquartered in South Carolina, RSi, has been recognized nationally for its exceptional debt collection services. The firm achieved the prestigious "Best in KLAS" title in the Debt Collection category of the 2025 Best in KLAS Awards. This accolade solidifies RSi's position as a top performer in the industry. The award was announced on February 5th and highlights the company's outstanding performance in providing debt collection services.

news.headline: Global Automotive SoC market valued at USD 54.50B in 2023, to grow at CAGR of 6.7%, projected to reach USD 114.87B by 2034. Rise driven by advanced features in passenger vehicles. Asia Pacific leads regional performance. Key players include Intel, NVIDIA, Qualcomm. Major growth drivers are increasing EV adoption, demand for connected cars, prominence of safety features and autonomous driving development.
news.summary: The global automotive System-on-Chip (SoC) market was valued at US$54.50 billion in 2023 and is expected to grow at a CAGR of 6.7% between 2024 and 2034, reaching over US$114.87 billion by 2034. Automotive SoCs are crucial for advanced features such as AI, machine learning, and autonomous driving. Passenger vehicles are driving demand, with analog ICs leading market growth. The Asia Pacific region dominates the market, with key players including Intel, NVIDIA, and Qualcomm. Growth drivers include the rise of electric vehicles and connected cars, driving demand for safety features and advanced driver-assistance systems. The development of autonomous vehicles further emphasizes the importance of automotive SoCs.

news.headline: Private employment rose by 183,000 in January 2025, beating expectations. Consumer-facing industries led hiring growth.
news.summary: In January 2025, private employers in the United States added 183,000 new jobs, showing a slight increase from the previous month's revised 176,000 and surpassing the anticipated 150,000 jobs. The ADP National Employment Report by Automatic Data Processing Inc. unveiled this news, illustrating the persistent strength in the private labor sector. With the upcoming non-farm payrolls report by the Bureau of Labor Statistics, there is anticipation of a hiring slowdown. Economists predict a decrease from 256,000 new jobs in December to 170,000. Reflecting on this data, Nela Richardson, ADP's chief economist, noted a disparity in the labor market where consumer-oriented industries led hiring, while business services and production sectors exhibited weaker job growth. The detailed analysis of job growth in January can be found in the complete story on Benzinga.com.

news.headline: Proposal by Trump to have US control Gaza sparks tensions in Middle East, with a divided response.
Recur360, a top QuickBooks add-on, now accessible to Canadian businesses for streamlined billing & payments.
news.summary: In Auburn, Alabama on February 5, 2025, Recur360, a top QuickBooks add-on for billing and payment solutions, is excited to share that QuickBooks users in Canada now have the opportunity to enhance their billing and payment procedures with the help of Recur360. This innovative tool offers robust features aimed at streamlining the billing and payment systems for users.

news.headline: Overlap Holdings launches a new flagship fund led by Wall Street veteran Justin Stevens, focusing on funding startups addressing global challenges. New York, Feb. 5, 2025.
news.summary: A venture capital firm called Overlap Holdings, led by Justin Stevens, a seasoned professional from Wall Street, has launched a new fund on February 5, 2025. The firm aims to support startups dedicated to addressing significant global challenges. This fund combines strategies from Wall Street and Silicon Valley to guide these startups through their financial journey.

news.headline: Notice of UPM-Kymmene Corporation's Annual General Meeting on Feb 5, 2025 at 15:00 EET in Helsinki.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, at 15:00 EET, in Helsinki, the UPM-Kymmene Corporation announced its Annual General Meeting notice to its shareholders. The meeting aims to address various company matters and discuss the future direction. Shareholders of the corporation are encouraged to participate and engage in the decision-making process. This meeting marks a crucial opportunity for shareholders to express their views and vote on key agenda items. It is an integral part of UPM-Kymmene Corporation's corporate governance framework and plays a significant role in shaping the company's strategies. The AGM will cover important aspects of the company's financial performance, future outlook, and any proposed resolutions. It is vital for shareholders to attend this meeting to actively contribute to the decision-making process.

news.headline: Lydia Dishman appointed as VP Content Strategy at Method Communications, bringing expertise as former Fast Company editor.
news.summary: A seasoned journalist and editor, Lydia Dishman, has recently been appointed as the VP of Content Strategy at Method Communications in Salt Lake City. With an impressive track record and experience in Tier 1 media outlets, Dishman's addition underscores the agency's commitment to recruiting top talent. This move, announced on February 5, 2025, strengthens the agency's team which includes a growing number of former Tier 1 media professionals. Dishman's expertise will undoubtedly contribute to the agency's continued success.

news.headline: Alegeus and Empower join forces in strategic partnership merging health and wealth services.
news.summary: In WALTHAM, Massachusetts, on February 5, 2025, Alegeus, a prominent healthcare benefit and payment solutions provider, disclosed a significant strategic collaboration with Empower, a top player in retirement and wealth management services. This partnership marks a notable development in the industry, with both companies set to leverage their expertise to enhance their offerings. This move symbolizes a forward-thinking strategy aimed at tapping into new opportunities in the market.

news.headline: Tim Ager becomes VP Sales at BreachLock amidst rapid growth after successful 2024, leading in attack surface discovery.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, BreachLock, recognized globally for its expertise in Continuous Attack Surface Discovery and Penetration Testing, revealed the selection of Tim Ager as the Vice President of Sales for the Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA) region. This decision comes after a prosperous year in 2024 for BreachLock amidst significant expansion.

news.headline: Study shows 81% of business leaders adapting to post-COVID "new normal," with 76% to use GenAI and 46% to implement automation.
news.summary: FM:Systems recently released their 2025 Inside the Workplace Report, revealing key statistics. The report shows that 76% of organizations are gearing up to introduce generative artificial intelligence (GenAI), with 46% intending to incorporate automation to aid in workplace operations and maintenance within the next year. Additionally, 82% of business leaders have plans to...

news.headline: Designium Inc. in Tokyo announces WebAR Template Service revolutionizing AR dev & customer engagement on Feb. 5, 2025.
news.summary: In Tokyo on February 5, 2025, Designium Inc., a prominent AR/XR studio, introduced its latest innovation, the WebAR Template Service. This service is designed to revolutionize customer interaction for businesses by providing immersive digital experiences. With the increasing popularity of augmented reality, Designium's cutting-edge service seeks to meet the growing demand for engaging AR experiences.

news.headline: GetWhys raises $2.75MM to boost AI customer insights platform for marketing teams, aiding companies like Docusign and Docker.
news.summary: A company known as GetWhys is ramping up marketing team efficiency for firms like Docusign, Commvault, and Docker by integrating customer insights into their operations. Recently, on February 5, 2025, in Boise, Idaho, GetWhys disclosed securing a significant $2.75 million seed funding to boost the expansion of its AI-driven customer-centric platform.

news.headline: EO Baltimore is hosting an event for Maryland entrepreneurs to network and gain inspiration for growth.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, in Baltimore, it was highlighted that the journey of every entrepreneur commences with a dream, a strong vision that propels them through challenging nights, significant risks, and a tireless endeavor to achieve success. However, even the most determined business proprietors reach a point where they inquire about the future, pondering on what lies ahead and how to progress further in their ventures.

news.headline: RNR Tire Express marks 25 years, opened 200th location, promoted 5 leaders, CEO Adam Sutton, on Franchise 500.
news.summary: RNR Tire Express (RNR) recently achieved a significant milestone by inaugurating its 200th location, marking a pivotal point in its expansion journey. The company also made notable promotions within its leadership team, which includes the appointment of Adam Sutton as CEO. Commencing the year on a positive note, RNR garnered recognition on Entrepreneur's prestigious Franchise 500 list. The news was disseminated from TAMPA, Fla., on Feb. 5, 2025.

news.headline: Giovanni Eco Chic Beauty to present Makeup & Hair Stylist Guild Awards with L'Oréal Groupe on Feb 15, 2025 in LA. Hollywood style masters to be honored for best hair looks in film and TV. #GiovanniEcoChicBeauty #HairCare #EntertainmentIndustry #MakeupandHairStylistGuildAwards #LOréalGroupe.
news.summary: Recognition will be given to the top hairstylists in the entertainment industry for creating the best hair looks in movies and television. The event is set to take place in Los Angeles on February 5, 2025. Giovanni Eco Chic Beauty will be highlighted as a key sponsor alongside other major events like the GRAMMYs and the Oscars©. This event will showcase the talents of these Hollywood stylists as they glam up celebrities for various high-profile appearances.

news.headline: Clearway Pain Solutions acquires Eastern Neurodiagnostic Associates. Expanding reach and expertise in pain management.
news.summary: In Annapolis, Maryland on February 5th, 2025, Clearway Pain Solutions, a prominent provider of pain management and neurological care, has acquired Eastern Neurodiagnostic Associates P.C., a respected multi-specialty medical practice. This acquisition marks a significant move in Clearway's expansion strategy, further solidifying its position as a national leader in the healthcare industry. The transaction is expected to enhance Clearway's service offerings and geographical reach, benefiting the numerous patients who rely on their expertise.

news.headline: Avance Gas Holding Ltd will release Q4 2024 results on Feb 12, 2025, with an audio webcast and conference call at 14:00 CET. Visit www.avancegas.com for more info.
news.summary: Bermuda, 02/05/2025 - Avance Gas Holding Ltd. (AGAS) is set to unveil its unaudited Q4 2024 results on 02/12/2025. A conference call and audio webcast are scheduled for 14:00 (CET) on the same day. The event will be accessible via the Investor Relations section on Avance Gas' official website, www.avancegas.com. Link details for the presentation and webcast will be provided prior to the session.

news.headline: Hungary election: Orban focuses on rural pensioners, increases spending ahead of vote.
news.summary: The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in the country has reached 100,000, with 10,000 new cases reported in the last week alone. The death toll has also risen to 2,000. Health officials are urging the public to continue practicing social distancing and wearing masks to slow the spread of the virus. Additionally, hospitals are at 80% capacity and are facing a shortage of medical supplies. The government is considering implementing stricter lockdown measures to curb the rising number of cases.

news.headline: Firebird Energy launches new protein-coffee blend for prolonged energy and endurance. Released on Feb. 5, 2025 in Fort Lauderdale.
news.summary: A groundbreaking protein-coffee blend has been developed to boost energy levels and enhance endurance. Released in Fort Lauderdale, Florida on February 5, 2025, this innovative product aims to meet the global demand for increased energy. Whether it's professionals in the workplace, students in educational settings, or parents caring for young children, people of all walks of life are seeking a sustainable energy solution. The blend is meticulously crafted to provide the necessary stamina for daily activities, offering a unique combination of protein and caffeine to keep individuals performing at their best.

news.headline: Auto Link appoints Stephen Riley as GM for growth and strategic initiatives. 25-year industry veteran. Leading auto-lending solutions provider.
news.summary: Stephen Riley has been appointed as the General Manager of Sales, Technology, and Operations at Auto Link, a prominent auto-lending solutions provider for financial institutions based in HARAHAN, La. Effective February 5, 2025, Riley will spearhead growth and strategic plans for the company.

news.headline: Engaged Golf in Pinehurst, NC introduces program for those with dementia who enjoy the game.
news.summary: In Pinehurst, North Carolina on February 5, 2025, it is not unusual to hear the exclaimed warning "Fore!" on the numerous golf courses spread across Moore County as golfers attempt to steer their shots towards the fairway. Just like an errant golf shot, dementia, which is essentially a form of brain change, can also veer individuals off course. In some cases, this condition could lead to significant loss...

news.headline: YMX Logistics Executives named among top 2025 Rock Stars of the Supply Chain by Food Logistics. Henderson, NV.
news.summary: Henderson, Nevada - On February 5, 2025, Matt Yearling and Erin Mitchell were acknowledged for their exceptional leadership skills in enhancing yard logistics for large-scale shippers. The recognition was awarded by Food Logistics, a prominent publication focused on the transportation of goods in the international cold food supply chain. This recognition is a testament to their pioneering work in this field and highlights their dedication to improving operational efficiency in the industry.

news.headline: Cutting Edge Health partners with Limitless Guided Visualizations for neuroscience-based patient care.
news.summary: Elkhart, Indiana - On February 5, 2025, Cutting Edge Health, headed by Orlando A. Landrum, MD, MBA, known for their advanced interventional neuroscience techniques, revealed a significant collaboration with Limitless Guided Visualizations. This partnership aims to combine Cutting Edge Health's expertise with Limitless Guided Visualizations' mental wellness app to provide innovative solutions.

news.headline: US patent granted for repurposed malaria drug by Armaceutica, Inc. for cancer treatment. By Renato Aguilera, Ph.D.
news.summary: In El Paso, Texas on February 5th, 2025, a US patent was issued for a groundbreaking drug titled "Bifunctional Compositions for the Treatment of Cancer". This medication, originally intended for malaria treatment, is being repurposed by Armaceutica, Inc. to combat different forms of cancer. Renato Aguilera, Ph.D., a prominent figure in biology and research, is leading the developments in this innovative approach.

news.headline: AITX sees an increase in SLED market with multiple ROSA orders, boosting growth further.
REPAY integrates with Lightspeed DMS, expanding beyond auto industry, offering payment automation to retailers. (Words: 23)
news.summary: Repay Holdings Corporation (NASDAQ: RPAY) has revealed a recent partnership with Lightspeed DMS, a top recreational dealer management software provider. This move signifies REPAY's initial venture outside the automotive sector, providing payment automation services to a broader array of retailers and dealerships. This integration is expected to enhance revenue generation and productivity for various businesses.

news.headline: Bullish Global, backed by Peter Thiel, considers IPO in 2025 amid crypto market boom. Company manages $10B.
news.summary: Following a surge in the cryptocurrency market, reports suggest that crypto exchange Bullish Global is considering an initial public offering (IPO) in 2025. The subsidiary of Block.one is potentially partnering with Jefferies Financial Group for the IPO. Bullish Global, headed by CEO Tom Farley, has a workforce of over 275 employees worldwide and operates in Hong Kong, the U.S., and Europe. Its parent company, Block.one, led by Brendan Blumer and supported by Peter Thiel, Alan Howard, and Richard Li, was established in 2021. Bullish Global currently manages around $10 billion in assets.

news.headline: Robert Seidel steps down as CEO after 12 years at Alerion Aviation, to take on role as Chairman. Daniel Ramirez to succeed.
news.summary: In West Palm Beach, Florida, on February 5, 2025, Alerion Aviation revealed that Robert Seidel will be resigning from his role as Chief Executive Officer following a successful twelve-year tenure. His position will be assumed by Daniel Ramirez. Seidel played a vital role in driving the company's expansion and success during his time as CEO.

news.headline: "Christmas Tree of Kindness debuting at 2025 NYC Toy Fair, inspiring kindness with storybook, craft activity, app #ToyFairLife"
news.summary: Christmas Tree of Kindness, Inc. will be featured at the 2025 NYC Toy Fair from March 1-4 at the Javitz Center. The event, #ToyFairLife, will be held in New York City.

news.headline: ACR Poker introduces Team Online Championships Home Game on Feb 6 to play with members and win cash.
news.summary: Join in weekly games with members of the popular ACR Team Online for a chance to secure a spot in a special cash game with them. The exciting initiative by ACR Poker gives players the chance to compete against their favorite team members regularly. This opportunity comes as the company kicks off the program on February 5, 2025, in San Jose, Costa Rica. Join now to play with the ACR Team Online and win your way into an exclusive cash game with them.

news.headline: León Y Sol Tequila partners with Bay Area's Back of the House, Inc., in a move to boost presence in hospitality.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, in San Francisco, León Y Sol Tequila, a rapidly growing brand in the premium tequila market, announced a significant collaboration in the Bay Area's hospitality industry. The company is joining forces with Back of the House, Inc., a renowned restaurant group known for operating several highly popular dining establishments in the region. This strategic partnership is poised to bring innovative experiences to consumers in the area and further bolster the presence of both entities in the market.

news.headline: Porte Brown wins Client Service Excellence Award for fourth year. This Chicagoland firm offers accounting, audit, tax, tech, and wealth services.
news.summary: Today, Elk Grove Village, Illinois-based firm Porte Brown LLC, known for offering a wide range of services including accounting, audit, tax, technology, and wealth management, has been awarded the prestigious Best of Accounting Award. This award signifies their excellence in delivering top-notch services to their clients. Established in 2025, Porte Brown LLC has quickly become a renowned name in the Chicagoland area. More information about their services can be found on their website www.portebrown.com.

news.headline: Tortally Therapeutics, LLC in Md redefining mental health care with client-centered approach since June 2023.
news.summary: In Glen Burnie, Maryland on February 5, 2025, Tortally Therapeutics, LLC, a Maryland-based psychotherapy and counseling practice, has shared its dedication to providing client-focused mental health services amidst a competitive landscape. Established in June 2023, the practice aims to offer unique services to its clients.

news.headline: National Hardware Show in Las Vegas introduces NHS Influencer Summit for exclusive access, immersive experiences, and networking. Feb. 5, 2025.
news.summary: Announcing The NHS Influencer Summit: Offering Unique Access, Engaging Experiences, and Genuine Networking Opportunities LAS VEGAS, February 5, 2025 - The National Hardware Show (NHS) is excited to introduce The NHS Influencer Summit. This exclusive event caters to the home improvement and hardware sector, bringing together industry professionals for a one-of-a-kind experience. Expect immersive activities, valuable networking connections, and insider access to cutting-edge trends.

news.headline: NettyWorth launches NettyScore, a Web3 credit score, for decentralized lending. Revolutionizing loan protocols with AI.
news.summary: In San Francisco on February 5, 2025, NettyWorth, a platform utilizing artificial intelligence for loans secured by NFTs and Real-World Assets (RWAs), has unveiled NettyScore. This new feature is a cutting-edge credit assessment system implemented within the Web3 framework. It reviews borrowers' loan activities on blockchain, such as repayments, to evaluate creditworthiness in a decentralized manner.

news.headline: NFL Hall of Famer Jerome Bettis partners with CDC Foundation to raise awareness on hypertension's impact on Black adults, a leading cause of cardiovascular deaths.
news.summary: In recent news from Atlanta on February 5, 2025, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) revealed that uncontrolled hypertension stands out as a top reason behind cardiovascular disease-related fatalities. Shockingly, a significant number of individuals remain unaware of their elevated blood pressure levels due to the condition often being asymptomatic. This highlights the urgent need for greater awareness and proactive health monitoring to combat this prevalent issue.

news.headline: Nordic wins 2025 Best in KLAS award for Clinical Optimization marking its 15th anniversary.
news.summary: In Madison, Wisconsin on February 5, 2025, Nordic®, an international consulting company specializing in health and technology, was recognized with a Best in KLAS award for Clinical Optimization in the latest 2025 Best in KLAS Awards - Software and Services report. This prestigious designation is based on feedback collected from customers and stakeholders in the industry. The report highlights Nordic®'s top-ranking performance in the field of Clinical Optimization, solidifying its position as a leader in the industry for offering outstanding services.
